luckyDrawUseBallComment: Washandisa Bhora reMhanza kupinda muRucky Draw.
partnerMailContents1: Ndokumbira utarise magwaro anodiwa kuti atenderwe nemumwe wako uye tumira mhinduro nefaira rakabatanidzwa!
partnerMailContents3:
Ndokumbira uise kopi yeID yako kadhi kana pasipoti
kuti uone kuti mumwe wako ndiani.
partnerMailContents5:
Ndapota tarisai magwaro nemashoko anodiwa
kuti uwane mvumo yemumwe wako uye titumire mhinduro!
partnerMailContents6: (Transaction mhando, nhamba yenzira, nhamba yeakaundi, zita rekutanga reane account, zita repakati, rekupedzisira, nhamba dzenhare dzemugamuchiri, nezvimwewo)
partnerMailContents8:
Ndapota titumirei nhamba dzenhare kwamunogona kusvikwa
kutaurirana nemumwe wako.
partnerMailContents9:
Ndokumbira utumire mhinduro yako neemail kune partner@buflexz.com .
Mushure mekunge boka rekuvhiya ratarisa mhinduro, kutariswa kwemudiwa uye kubvumidzwa kunogadziriswa.
authMailContents3: Kiyi yekusimbisa yakapihwa kuti email iite chokwadi.
authMailContents4:
Ndokumbira uise nhamba ye6-manhamba yechokwadi mukati mehuchokwadi
hwindo mukati meapp kana kukopa uye unamate nhamba yekusimbisa.
authMailContents5:
Iyi email ndeyekutumira chete.
Mhinduro hadzigone, saka kana uine chero mibvunzo kana zvinokunetsa,
ndapota taura nesu kuburikidza nenzvimbo yevatengi mukati meBUFLEXZ app.
